projectGridLines.description:
Title: Product Intern

 

Description:  

 

We are revolutionizing the secured loan industry by creating a digital platform that simplifies the end-to-end process of availing secured loans. Our product focuses on streamlining documentation, improving loan disbursal efficiency, and enhancing user experience through automation and data-driven insights. By addressing traditional bottlenecks in secured lending, we are building a secure, transparent, and seamless ecosystem for borrowers and financial institutions.

 

As a Product Intern, you will play an integral role in the development of our secured loan platform. You will have the opportunity to work closely with the product team and collaborate with cross-functional stakeholders including engineering, design, marketing, and customer success to help shape the next generation of our lending product. This is a hands-on role where you will contribute to the research, ideation, and execution of features aimed at solving real customer pain points.

 

This internship offers valuable experience in product management, allowing you to contribute to a game-changing financial product while learning the intricacies of the product lifecycle from ideation through to execution and iteration.

 

Skill sets & Traits expectation:

Curiosity & Eagerness to Learn

·        Analytical Thinking

·        Collaboration & Teamwork

·        Adaptability & Flexibility

·        Problem-Solving Mindset

 

Expected learning:

·        The full product development lifecycle from ideation to launch and iteration.

·        How to define and prioritize features based on user needs and business objectives.

·        How to collaborate with diverse teams including engineering, marketing, and customer success.

·        How to analyze customer feedback and data to drive continuous product improvement.

·        Insights into the financial services industry and the role of technology in transforming lending products.

Specific courses required for project execution: Any stream

Title: Data Science and Analytics Intern

 

Description:

We are transforming the secured loan industry by digitizing and optimizing the lending process. Our platform leverages technology to streamline operations, improve customer experiences, and enable faster, data-driven decisions for financial institutions. By tackling inefficiencies in traditional secured lending, we aim to create a secure, transparent, and scalable solution for borrowers and lenders alike.

 

As a Data Science and Analytics Intern, you will play a crucial role in leveraging data to drive business decisions and improve our secured loan platform. You will work closely with the product, engineering, and data science teams to analyze large datasets, build predictive models, and generate insights that optimize key processes such as risk assessment, loan disbursement, and customer engagement. This hands-on internship will provide you with valuable exposure to the intersection of data science and fintech, allowing you to apply your analytical skills to solve real-world problems and drive business impact.

 

Skill sets &Traits expectation:

·        Data Science & Analytical Skills

·        Data Visualization & Reporting

·        Database Management & SQL

·        Machine Learning & Statistical Modeling

·        Problem-Solving & Critical Thinking

·         

Expected learning:

  • Practical Application of Data Science in FinTech:
  • Gain hands-on experience applying data science techniques to solve real-world problems in the lending industry, from risk modeling to loan disbursement and customer engagement.
  • Building & Optimizing Predictive Models:
  • Learn how to build and optimize machine learning models for practical applications in a growing startup environment.
  • Collaboration with Cross-Functional Teams:
  • Understand the importance of collaborating with product, engineering, and business teams to create data-driven solutions that align with business goals.
  • Data-Driven Decision-Making:
  • Develop a deeper understanding of how data-driven insights shape business decisions, product development, and customer experience in the fintech space.
  • Exposure to Real-World Data Challenges:
  • Experience working with real-world, large-scale datasets and tackling challenges such as data cleaning, feature engineering, and model deployment.

 

 

Specific courses required for project execution:  understanding of SQL & Python is mandatory
